label: specifiedCreditorFinancialAccount
comment: A creditor financial account specified for this trade settlement payment means.

rangeIncludes.comment: A specific business arrangement whereby credits arising from transactions are recorded.

domainIncludes.comment: A collection of financing related data that provides an overview of key points.
The means by which a payment will be or has been made for trade settlement purposes.
An individual, a group, or a body having a role as a requestor.
